name: Roots Quest
description:
An action-adventure game originally created for Global Game Jam 2023 Online
Theme : Roots

You play as an adventurer searching for clues about your great grandfather and his connection to an old amulet, that someone tried several times to steal from your house. You have just arrived at the valley where his castle once stood.

Controls:

W,A,S,D - Move character
Mouse - Look around (only in horizontal axis)
Left Click - Attack with weapons, interact with map entities, UI

Credits:

Vasilis Chonianakis - Code, Design
Spyridon Glarakis - Graphics, Music, Sounds
